title: Public Procurement Buyer Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for categorizing buyers and contracting authorities in public procurement.

terms.label: Central Government
terms.definition: A national or federal ministry, department, or central government body that acts as a buyer or contracting authority.

terms.label: Sub-central Government
terms.definition: A regional, state, provincial, or equivalent subnational government body acting as a buyer or contracting authority.

terms.label: Local Authority
terms.definition: A municipality, city, county, or other local public authority that acts as a buyer or contracting authority.

terms.label: State-owned Enterprise
terms.definition: An enterprise in which public bodies hold a controlling interest and which conducts commercial or service activities, acting as a buyer.

terms.label: Public Body or Agency
terms.definition: A publicly controlled body or agency with a mandate to provide public services and which may act as a contracting authority.

terms.label: International Organization
terms.definition: An international or multilateral organization acting as a buyer or funder in procurement processes.

terms.label: Other Buyer Type
terms.definition: A buyer or contracting authority type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary.
